channel.title: Requesting rsca scripts to be made
channel.description:
First off [font=Verdana]I AM Not[/font] buying/selling/trading runescape accounts this account will be given away [size=10pt][size=10pt][color=red]NOT BOUGHT, Sold or traded IF this is against the rule then ban me now as i have already gotten a warning and that will show those rs2 players just how serious you are..................lol poor kids
hi im looking for a couple scripts i would like made for me. The game is located at [url=http://www.rscangel.org/]http://www.rscangel.org/[/url] I would like a karamja harpoon fisher that will fish a full load of tuna and swordies then walk to general store and sell em, also needs to click the sleeping bag and just wait till i type the word in then start over And I wouldlike it to have a draynor banking function. [URL=http://img19.imageshack.us/my.php?image=93819046.png][IMG]http://img19.imageshack.us/img19/4489/93819046.png[/img][/URL]The second script i would like is a iron miner that will bank and sleep. and a smither for it aswell.
In return as a [size=20pt]DONATION[/size] from me. As i hate rs2 this account will be given away [size=10pt][size=10pt]NOT BOUGHT, Sold or traded[/size][/size] just given away[URL=http://img2.imageshack.us/my.php?image=11530811.png][IMG]http://img2.imageshack.us/img2/2497/11530811.png[/img][/URL]

item.title: Requesting rsca scripts to be made
item.dc:creator: @davidude36 Brolapse
item.description:
@davidude36 wrote:

So in return for someone making you this script you are donating them a runescape account?

Sounds an awful lot like trading. What ever, I’ll let this slide because I haven’t seen a script bought or sold in ageeees and am doubtful you’ll get anywhere.

Read full topic
item.source: Requesting rsca scripts to be made

item.title: Requesting rsca scripts to be made
item.dc:creator: @cooper cooper
item.description:
@cooper wrote:

I’ll take the account, pm me details

Read full topic
